DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study to evaluate the effect of sodium bicarbonate administration on cardiopulmonary resuscitation results and outcomes in cardiac arrest patient with severe metabolic acidosis.
DOC.brief_title: Bicarbonate in Patients With Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest
DOC.criteria: adult cardiac arrest patient with arterial pH <7.1 or bicarbonate <10mmEq/L checked at 10 minutes of cardiopulmonary resuscitation age <18 trauma patient Do Not Resuscitate state
